summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to Land Use and Zoning, establishing new development regulations for the Greenbelt Overlay District; repealing Ordinance 111568 as amended and adding a new Chapter 23.70 to Title 23 of the Seattle Municipal Code; and amending Sections 23.76.004, 23.76.006, 23.76.030, 23.84.014, 23.90.024, and 22.900.240.
